TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Retrieve GetResourcePropertyDocument from Producer / Provider with custom root xml element
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: The objective is for the Consumer to retrieve the list of Resource Properties supported by the Producer
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Consumer is interested in receivig the list of Resource Properties supported by the Producer to use them for Request/Response and/or Publish/Subscribe exchanges. In the response the root xml element of the data is not WSMPPublishSubscribeRP and WSMPRequestResponseRP
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: P/S and R/R.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Systems should be able to read WSMPPublishSubscribeRP and WSMPRequestResponseRP
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: The test is concluded after the Consumer has received a list of Resource Properties.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The consumer sends a request for the GetResourcePropertyDocument to the producer.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The Producer receives a valid request for resource properties.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Producer sends the resource property document with properties it supports
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumer receives a valid response for resource properties not using WSMPPublishSubscribeRP and WSMPRequestResponseRP.
